title: Karat Interview Product
text: Karat Interview Simply the best technical interviews Identify and hire top talent with expert interviewers and research-backed content that generates a superior hiring signal on real-world ability. Request demo Product details An innovative human + tech solution - Battle-tested content Capture a stronger hiring signal with thoroughly researched interview content built to evaluate competencies most predictive of performance. 3x higher onsite-to-offer ratio - Expert interview engineers Reclaim engineering bandwidth with live, human-led interviews conducted by experienced, certified interview engineers. 48 hours reclaimed per hire - Flexible scheduling Accelerate hiring with 24/7, on-demand interviewing available same-day, evenings, and weekends. 50% reduction in time-to-hire - Consistent hiring processes Reduce bias with structured interview formats and consistent scoring rubrics to produce fair and trustworthy results. 60% more inclusive hires By the numbers The world’s leader in technical interviewing 350k+ k+ technical interviews conducted 70 + countries where we’ve interviewed 500 + trained and vetted interview engineers around the world 1 m+ hours reclaimed back to engineers AI Outlook Hire AI Engineers Prepare your organization for the future by identifying engineers who have the skills to build with and adapt to the latest evolution in tech. Getting started The right content + the right interviewer = the right results Step 01 Step 01 Build a tailored interview plan by working with one of our expert solutions engineers to determine the technologies, content, and level best suited for your role. Step 02 Step 02 Reclaim engineering bandwidth by using Karat’s network of expert Interview Engineers to assess a candidate’s technical ability. Step 03 Step 03 Use Karat’s strong, predictive signal to advance the most qualified candidates to your final round, then extend your offers with confidence. Our products Seamless technical hiring, from application to offer “ Ran Harpaz Former CTO Hippo “ Joseph Sirosh Former CTO Compass “ Cat Miller Former CTO Flatiron Health “ Martin Kess Head of Engineering Fractal Software “ Margaret Smith Head of Human Resources Compass FAQ Frequently asked questions Karat has an extensive library of Karat Interviews that both allow and do not allow the use of ChatGPT. Regardless, Karat’s Interviews are built to be resilient to cheating with pressure-tested AI-resistant interview content. The Karat Interview currently supports a library of over 100 technical languages and frameworks. Our solutions engineers are happy to work with you to identify the roles and languages that meet your hiring needs. After selecting a candidate for a technical interview, you can sit back and relax. Karat will leverage its vetted network of expert interviewers to evaluate the candidate’s technical ability.
